manualPage.mainTitle: New here? Here's how to use our service step by step
manualPage.tryTutorial: Now try the tutorial to learn how to play with a machine.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description:
Connect using OpenVPN.
Download your VPN configuration and connect from your environment.

spawn.title: Spawn Machine
spawn.description: Create a machine and start hacking.

hints.title: Hints
hints.description: If you need a hint, press the button.

0.title: Introduction
0.description: Welcome to the web-based hacking lab, Hack This Out!

1.title: Rules
descriptions: 1. Complete a machine by capturing the flag through hacking.
2. You will earn experience points (EXP) upon completing a machine.
3. You can use hints for each machine, but penalties will apply.

2.title: Modes
descriptions: Basic Mode: Hack a vulnerable machine.
Competition Mode: Complete all given machines as fast as possible within the time limit.

3.title: Ranking
3.description: Your rank is determined by your accumulated experience points!

4.title: Machines
4.description: Create and play machines. You can leave reviews on them. Machine creation is subject to admin approval.

5.title: Contests
5.description: Hack machines in real-time competitive events!

joyride.firstVisit: Check this guide if it's your first visit.
joyride.machines: Spawn machines and try hacking them.
joyride.contests: Join CTF contests and challenge yourself.
